item.title: Court Sides With New York Times Over Access to E.U. Covid Vaccine Messages
item.description: The case revolved around whether texts between a top official and a drug company executive counted as a public record that might need to be disclosed.

item.title: Live Updates: Trump Lands in Qatar After Meeting Militant Who Now Leads Syria
item.description: President Trump’s meeting with President Ahmed al-Shara came after he said he would lift U.S. sanctions on Syria. Mr. Trump’s Gulf tour has mostly sid...

item.title: Pepe Mujica, the Former Uruguayan President, Removed the Pomp from Politics
item.description: The former Uruguayan president, who died on Tuesday, showed the value in world leaders living like their constituents.

item.title: Trump Administration to Weaken Some Limits on PFAS in Drinking Water
item.description: The E.P.A. said it would maintain limits on the two most common PFAS chemicals found in tap water but roll back rules for four others.

item.title: Map: 6.0-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near Crete, Prompting a Tsunami Alert
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.
